scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID ('Balaji.Productedited') IS NOT NULL 
DROP TABLE Balaji.Productedited
Create table Balaji.Productedited (
    ProductCategoryID INTEGER,
    UnpivotKey VARCHAR(100),  
    newColumn INTEGER,
    ProductID INTEGER,
    Name VARCHAR(100),
    ProductNumber VARCHAR(100),
    Color VARCHAR(100),
    StandardCost DECIMAL(10,2),
    ListPrice DECIMAL(10,2),
    Size VARCHAR(100),
    Weight DECIMAL(10,2),
    ProductModelID INTEGER,
    SellStartDate INTEGER,
    SellEndDate VARCHAR(100),
    DiscontinuedDate VARCHAR(100),
    ThumbNailPhoto VARBINARY(6000),
    ThumbnailPhotoFileName 
    VARCHAR(100),
    rowguid VARCHAR(100),
    ModifiedDate VARCHAR(MAX),
    ParentProductCategoryID INTEGER,
    [Rank column] INTEGER,
    Entries INTEGER)
